history.content: Hello- it's recommended that you fill out the degree worksheet, but not required. It gives you a chance to work out a plan to discuss with your faculty adviser. This page has all of the degree worksheets: http://engineering.berkeley.edu/student-services/degree-requirements/degree-worksheets. The LSCS one is not year specific https://eecs.berkeley.edu/sites/default/files/lscs_degree_worksheet.pdf

Hello- it's recommended that you fill out the degree worksheet, but not required. It gives you a chance to work out a plan to discuss with your faculty adviser. This page has all of the degree worksheets: http://engineering.berkeley.edu/student-services/degree-requirements/degree-worksheets

I was wondering if freshmen needed to fill out a degree worksheet for the faculty advising sessions coming up. In the email, there are instructions stating that we should, but I can't find a degree worksheet for students who enrolled in 2016. Can someone link me to the correct degree worksheet? Thanks.
history.subject: Faculty Advising Fall 2016 Degree Worksheet
